movie.title: Krakatoa: Volcano of Destruction
movie.plot: In 1883, the volcanic island of Krakatoa erupted, killing 36,000 people and unleashing a series of terrifying tsunamis. This docu-drama uses eye witness accounts to tell the true story of one of the most destructive natural disasters in history.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 3 nominations.
